FuncDef: The display lldp neighbor brief command displays summary information about Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP) neighbors. The display lldp neighbor brief command displays summary information about Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP) neighbors.
ExtraInfo: To quickly obtain summary information about LLDP neighbors, run the display lldp neighbor brief command. The summary information about LLDP neighbors includes the local interface name, neighbor name, neighbor interface name, and neighbor information aging time.
